titles.title: ICEE HOT Act of 2022
ICEE HOT Act of 2022
Installing Clean Efficient Energy Hastens Our Transition Act of 2022

A bill to amend the Energy Policy Act of 2005 to establish an energy efficient appliance rebate program to provide rebates for the manufacturing, distribution, and shipment of certain building electrification products, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Installing Clean Efficient Energy Hastens Our Transition Act of 2022 or the ICEE HOT Act of 2022
This bill revises the State Energy Efficient Appliance Rebate Program by allowing states to provide rebates to distributors and original equipment manufacturers of certain electrical heating appliances (e.g., heat pumps, heat pump water heaters, and heat pump clothes dryers) that are made in the United States.
